Why take a Loan Against Mutual Funds?

Use your portfolio as collateral and get **instant liquidity**, while retaining upside.

Quick Disbursal

Get funds within 24–48 hours

No need to sell your investments — pledge your mutual funds and access liquidity fast.

Competitive Interest

Low cost vs unsecured credit

Interest is charged only on the amount you borrow. Rates are typically lower than personal loans.

Flexible Tenure

Choose repayment terms that fit

Short-term bridge loans or longer tenures — structure your repayment as per cashflow.

Retain Upside

Your SIP & growth continues

You keep exposure to market upside while using funds for needs — useful for tax-efficient planning.

How it works — simple & transparent

A short 4-step flow to get funds without selling your holdings.

1

Apply

Fill quick online form & upload KYC.

2

Pledge

We pledge your mutual funds in a nominee/pledge account.

3

Verify

Simple verification & LTV calculation based on fund type.

4

Disburse

Funds credited to your bank account quickly.

Eligibility & Documents

Simple KYC + portfolio verification. Typical checklist:

  • PAN card
  • Proof of bank account (Cancelled cheque)
  • Statement & holding details / latest folio holdings

Quick note

This calculator is **indicative**. Final approval, interest rate, and LTV are subject to fund type, AMCs, and internal underwriting.

Frequently asked questions

What maximum LTV can I get?

LTV depends on fund type and underlying asset quality — typically 60%–90% depending on fund category and AMC rules.

Do I lose my mutual fund holdings?

No — the funds are pledged; you retain economic exposure. If you default, the lender can liquidate the pledged units.

Are there prepayment charges?

Some plans may have charges for early closure — check product T&Cs. We offer flexible prepayment plans for most customers.

Is this loan taxable?

Loan proceeds are not taxable as income. However, any gains/losses on fund liquidation (if it occurs) have tax implications.

Ready to unlock liquidity from your portfolio?

Apply now and get a personalised offer — fast approvals and transparent terms.
